Text: Cc you havent done it already please cross out the note on your calendar that today is the day the Conoco trial starts What better day to announce a celebration of the settlement since without it many of us would be sitting in a courtroom in Midland wondering whether the trial would last weeks or With that image firmly in mind please plan on joining us for a celebratory dinner on Thursday August th at at Brennans Again thanks for all of your efforts on this case and I hope to see you on the th DF
Re Employee Safety OrientationsDrew was scheduled to attend May th pm but will not be able attend as he has an important conference call Carmen

Kathy NRON Amelia NRON Julie NRON Anne NRON Emily SellersET NRON Ricki WintersET nron Janice NRON Linda WehringET NRON Deb CappielloET NRON Tammy NRON Martha BennerET NRON Sharon SolonET NRON Zelda NRON Melinda NRON Kim nron Judy KudymET NRON Amelia NRON Subject ETS MONDAY MORNING STAFF MEETINGS This is to advise you that we will NOT have ETS Monday morning staff meetings on December or December Please make note that the next ETS Staff Meeting will be held on Tuesday January at AM in C And then on January well resume our regular schedule of having our staff meetings on Monday mornings at AM Regards and Happy Holidays Cindy X

Cc you havent done it already please cross out the note on your calendar that today is the day the Conoco trial starts What better day to announce a celebration of the settlement since without it many of us would be sitting in a courtroom in Midland wondering whether the trial would last weeks or With that image firmly in mind please plan on joining us for a celebratory dinner on Thursday August th at at Brennans Again thanks for all of your efforts on this case and I hope to see you on the th DF
Virtual Power Meeting Cc is scheduled for Monday November at pm in the Video Conference Room C Houston Thank you Martha x
Virtual Power Meeting Cc meeting has been rescheduled for Thursday November at AM in the video conference room C in Houston Martha x

Dave SchaferVignaroli AM To Janet BowersET NRON Lisa NRON Beth NRON Dana JonesET NRON Jane CT Mary Kay MillerET NRON Virginia O nron Sharon SolonET NRON Gary SovaET NRON cc Subject Dave Schafer Last saturday at Genies service in Concordia KS I talked with Dave and since he planned to spend most of this week in KC agreed to meet in KC for talk and lunch Hes in KC to support daughter Angie and to be there on friday when she goes in for an ultrasound Keep your fingers crossed she prefers a girl I went down yesterday morning and returned in the afternoon Really a swell if not at times tough day We met and chatted for about hours at his hotel before going to pick up Angie for a hour lunch nice little Italian place Cafe Italia Obviously the day was a roller coaster ride of emotions However they both are doing well Dave perhaps better than Angie but both are fine At times Dave was his usual irreverent self and we enjoyed many chuckles love to listen to the guy go off At other times perhaps we reminesced too deeply Daves latest plans are to return to Houston on Saturday He mentioned to Angie at lunch that Dana and Robert have requested that he stay with them for awhile and he will do so Angie will follow Dave shortly to help him with matters in Houston I dont know when she will travel to Houston He also brought up the subject of a memorial service in Omaha He was struggling with his emotions not wanting to hurt any feelings in Omaha but also wanting to get on with the healing process He Angie agreed finally decided to forego a service in Omaha relieved Im sure
Monday Morning Staff Meetingyou will be out of the office next Monday November you will need to have someone fill in for you at the staff meeting Martha

Electronic Filing Demo Cc you give a copy of this memo to Maria Pavlou please Martha x Forwarded by Martha BennerETSEnron on PM From Naomi Bourg PM To Mary Kay MillerET NRON cc Glen HassET NRON Dari DornanET NRON Maria PavlouET NRON Martha BennerET NRON Subject Electronic Filing Demo Mary Kay The Capitol Connection will offer the electronic filing demonstration following the Commission meeting on November as a special FERC meeting live over the Internet We can contact Jan Butler at she is sick today or David Reininger or Julia Morelli at or visit Capitol Connections website at wwwcapitolconnectiongmuedu if we are interested in viewing the demo The cost for the videoaudio version would be for the st computer connection and for each additional connection with a maximum charge per site of Are we interested in seeing the demo Naomi

Oneok Measurement Letter Meeting Cc Craig will be attending the meeting he will come to Britts office Room EB Forwarded by Martha BennerETSEnron on AM MARTHA BENNER AM To Britt NRON Rick NRON Dari DornanET NRON cc Deborah nron Ann SmithET NRON Amelia NRON Amelia NRON Subject Oneok Measurement Letter A conference all to discuss the above is scheduled for today November at PM in Drew Fossums office Drew will call Britts office x Ken Cessac will be conferenced in from the field area If you have any questions please give me a call x Thanks for your help in this matter Martha
